title: iOS 26.1 update boosts iPhone security and performance improvements - Fox News - Apple News
content:
iOS 26.1 update boosts iPhone security and performance improvements – Fox News
NOVEMBER 8, 2025 APPLE NEWS
UNCATEGORIZED

Apple's iOS 26.1 update fixes over 50 security vulnerabilities in Safari, Photos and Apple Account settings while adding stronger privacy controls …
